entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -26.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 2:40 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -26.0°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 57 %

Dewpoint: -32.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
